sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer">
    <v-container class="bg-red" style="height: 100%" fluid>
      <v-row>
        <v-col>
          <v-list>
            <v-list-item
              v-for="(item, index) in items"
              :key="index"
              :value="item"
              :to="item.url"
            >
              <v-list-item-title v-text="item.text"></v-list-item-title>
              <template v-slot:prepend>
                <v-icon :icon="item.icon"></v-icon>
              </template>
            </v-list-item>
          </v-list>
          <v-divider class="pa-2"></v-divider>
          <v-expansion-panels variant="inset">
            <v-expansion-panel v-model="panel">
              <v-expansion-panel-title>Users</v-expansion-panel-title>
              <v-expansion-panel-text>
                <v-list>
                  <v-list-item
                    variant="plain"
                    v-for="(item, index) in users"
                    :key="index"
                    :value="item.name"
                    :to="item.url"
                    append-icon="mdi-arrow-right"
                  >
                    <v-list-item-title>{{ item.name }}</v-list-item-title>
                  </v-list-item>
                </v-list>
              </v-expansion-panel-text>
            </v-expansion-panel>
          </v-expansion-panels>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <v-row class="bg-pink" style="height: 30%" no-gutters>
        <v-col align-self="end" class="d-flex justify-center">
          <v-btn></v-btn>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-navigation-drawer>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "NavDrawer",
  props: {},
  data() {
    return {
      drawer: false,
      panel: false,
      items: [
        { text: "Home", url: "/", icon: "mdi-home-outline" },
        { text: "Settings", url: "settings", icon: "mdi-cog-outline" },
        { text: "About", url: "about", icon: "mdi-information-outline" },
      ],
      users: [
        { name: "Mico", url: "/" },
        { name: "Stella", url: "/" },
        { name: "Ben", url: "/" },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    openDrawer() {
      this.drawer = !this.drawer;
    },
  },
};
</script>
